name: Zombies Don't Drive (Early Access)
description:
After a long run you finally found a ride.
Drive through countless waves of zombies
Collect cash to upgrade your car and buy weapons

This is an early access game, so expect minor bugs and missing features.
Your feedback is much appreciated.

What's coming next 

  • achievements
  • more chunks (arena pieces, randomly placed in each round)
  • more weapons
  • different zombie types 
  • car upgrades (visual and funcional)

ZDD is a sequel to ZDR released back in 2013 on mobile platforms

Xinput controller support

Minimum system requirements
CPU: Core i3 2Ghz
GPU: Intel Iris 655
RAM: 4 GB
HDD: 700 MB
